about_the_game:
Equip this outfit to cosplay as Mana Kitada, one-half of the idol duo Dirty Bloody Princesses (DBP) from AKIBA'S TRIP: Hellbound & Debriefed.
This DLC will unlock the outfit for purchase in-game.

This DLC includes the following costume items:
DBP Microphone (weapon)
Mana's DBP Blouse (upper wear)
Mana's DBP Skirt (lower wear)
Mana's Underwear (underwear)
Mana's DBP Boots (footwear)

*You will need the base game (sold separately) and the latest version of the software to use this DLC.
